Class DialogBoxElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • box.DialogBoxElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, ListBox, TextField

    public abstract class DialogBoxElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the elements of dialogbox.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim
